languages.text: "Тогда решено. Гонения будут прекращены. От согласившихся содействовать кланов я жду помощи в поиске культистских амулетов и оружия. Те, кто отказывается содействовать — будут наказаны".
"Then it's decided. The harassment will end. I will expect the clans who have agreed here to assist in locating cultist amulets and weapons. Anyone who refuses will be punished."
languages.original_text: "Тогда решено. Гонения будут прекращены. От согласившихся содействовать кланов я жду помощи в поиске культистских амулетов и оружия. Те, кто отказывается содействовать — будут наказаны".

traits.locale_text: "Then it's decided. The harassment will end. I will expect the clans who have agreed here to assist in locating pirate amulets and weapons. Anyone who refuses will be punished."
"Then it's decided. The harassment will end. I will expect the clans who have agreed here to assist in locating pirate amulets and weapons. Anyone who refuses will be punished."
"Then it's decided. The harassment will end. I will expect the clans who have agreed here to assist in locating pirate amulets and weapons. Anyone who refuses will be punished."
"Then it's decided. The harassment will end. I will expect the clans who have agreed here to assist in locating cultist amulets and weapons. Anyone who refuses will be punished."

languages.text: “那就这么决定了，那些人不会再骚扰你们。我希望与我达成协议的氏族能协助我，找到那些异端分子遗留下来的所有护身符与武器。至于拒绝我的人，就准备接受惩罚吧。”
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The harassment will end. I will expect the clans who have agreed here to assist in locating cultist amulets and weapons. Anyone who refuses will be punished."

traits.locale_text: “那就这么决定了，那些人不会再骚扰你们。我希望与我达成协议的氏族能协助我，找到那些海盗遗留下来的所有护身符与武器。至于拒绝我的人，就准备接受惩罚吧。”

languages.text: «Está decidido, entonces. Se acabó el acoso. Espero que los clanes aquí reunidos cooperen para encontrar cualquier amuleto o arma que hayan dejado los cultistas. Los que se nieguen serán castigados».
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The harassment will end. I will expect the clans who have agreed here to assist in locating cultist amulets and weapons. Anyone who refuses will be punished."

traits.locale_text: «Está decidido, entonces. Se acabó el acoso. Espero que los clanes aquí reunidos cooperen para encontrar cualquier amuleto o arma que hayan dejado los piratas. Los que se nieguen serán castigados».

languages.text: 「それなら決まりだ。嫌がらせは終わりだ。ここに同意した者たちには、教団のお守りや武器の捜索に協力することを期待する。拒否した者は処罰する」
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The harassment will end. I will expect the clans who have agreed here to assist in locating cultist amulets and weapons. Anyone who refuses will be punished."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら決まりだ。嫌がらせは終わりだ。ここに同意した者たちには、教団のお守りや武器の捜索に協力することを期待する。拒否した者は処罰する」

languages.text: "Dann ist es entschieden. Die Tyrannei endet. Ich erwarte, dass die Clans, die eingewilligt haben, bei der Suche nach Kultistenamuletten und -waffen helfen. Wer sich weigert, der wird bestraft."
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The harassment will end. I will expect the clans who have agreed here to assist in locating cultist amulets and weapons. Anyone who refuses will be punished."

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist es entschieden. Die Tyrannei endet. Ich erwarte, dass die Clans, die eingewilligt haben, bei der Suche nach Piratenamuletten und -waffen helfen. Wer sich weigert, der wird bestraft."

languages.text: « Ma décision est prise. Les brimades vont cesser, et je compte sur les clans qui ont accepté de négocier pour nous aider à trouver les amulettes et les armes des cultistes. Tout acte d'insubordination sera sévèrement puni. »
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The harassment will end. I will expect the clans who have agreed here to assist in locating cultist amulets and weapons. Anyone who refuses will be punished."

traits.locale_text: « Ma décision est prise. Les brimades vont cesser, et je compte sur les clans qui ont accepté de négocier pour nous aider à trouver les amulettes et les armes des pirates. Tout acte d'insubordination sera sévèrement puni. »

languages.text: "Anlaştık o hâlde. Şiddete son verilecek. Mutabık klanların, tarikatçı uğurluklarının ve silahlarının bulunmasına yardımcı olmasını bekliyorum. Karşı gelenler cezalandırılacak."
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The harassment will end. I will expect the clans who have agreed here to assist in locating cultist amulets and weapons. Anyone who refuses will be punished."

traits.locale_text: "Anlaştık o hâlde. Şiddete son verilecek. Mutabık klanların tarikatçı uğurluklarının ve silahlarının bulunmasına yardımcı olmasını bekliyorum. Karşı gelenler cezalandırılacaktır."
